title: Blacklist management
subtitle: All deals sent to blacklisted addresses will be rejected.

onCheckAddressValidity.actorTypeIsNotAccount: {{address}} is not a Filecoin account actor type.
onCheckAddressValidity.invalidFormat: {{address}} is not a valid Filecoin address
onCheckAddressValidity.unsupportedType: {{address}} - this address type is not supported, use SECP256K1, ID or BLS address
onCheckAddressValidity.default: {{address}} cannot be added, please try again later or contact the CIDgravity team.

onCheckBlacklisted.isShortAddress: {{address}} resolves to {{resolved}} which is already blacklisted.

error.onBlacklistAddress: {{address}} cannot be blacklisted, please try later or contact the CIDgravity team.
error.onWhitelistAddress: An error occurred while whitelisting this address, please try later or contact the CIDgravity team.
error.onAddressGenericError: An error occurred while blacklisting this address, please try later or contact the CIDgravity team.

success.onBlacklistAddress: All deals from this address will now be rejected.
success.onWhitelistAddress: Address whitelisted, deals will now be processed.
